item.title: Stop procedure
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

i have this script that i need to stop when it does all the possible combinations. (of 5-25 character length)

please

[scar]program RandomStringGeneratorByRon;

var
i : integer;

procedure Generate;
var
a : string;
begin
for i := 0 to 20 do
begin
if(random(2) = 0)then
begin
insert(Chr(65+Random(26)), a, Random(Length(a)));
end else
begin
insert(Chr(97+Random(26)), a, Random(Length(a)));
end;
if(random(2) = 0)then
insert(Chr(48+Random(9)), a, Random(Length(a)));
end;
WriteLn(a);
end;

begin
ClearDebug;
repeat
Generate;
until(isfkeydown(12))
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
